verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>طّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Waṭ-ṭūr(i).
verses.translation: Клянусь Горою (Откровений)

verses.text_uthmani: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12891'>بٍ م</tajweed>َّسْط<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa kitābim masṭūr(in).
verses.translation: Начертанным Законом (Божьим)

verses.text_uthmani: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى رَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12892'>قٍّ م</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12893'>نش</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fī raqqim mansyūr(in).
verses.translation: Развернутым на свитке

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَيْتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12894'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَعْم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-baitil-ma'mūr(i).
verses.translation: И часто посещаемой молельней

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12895'>قْ</tajweed>فِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12896'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَرْف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>عِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Was-saqfil-marfū'(i).
verses.translation: И вознесенным пологом (небесным)

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَحْرِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12897'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَسْج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>رِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-baḥril-masjūr(i).
verses.translation: И океаном, вздутым (до предела)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>قِعٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Inna 'ażāba rabbika lawāqi'(un).
verses.translation: Поистине, падет на вас Господне наказанье

verses.text_uthmani: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مَّا لَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12898'>ن د</tajweed>َافِعٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Mā lahū min dāfi'(in).
verses.translation: Никто не отвратит Его

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12899'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ مَوْرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma tamūrus-samā'u maurā(n).
verses.translation: В тот День, Когда в волнение придет небесный свод

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَتَسِيرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12900'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa tasīrul-jibālu sairā(n).
verses.translation: И разлетятся горы

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَوَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12901'>لٌ ي</tajweed>َوْمَئِ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12902'>ذٍ ل</tajweed>ِّلْمُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fawailuy yauma'iżil lil-mukażżibīn(a).
verses.translation: Проклятием предстанет этот День для тех, Кто ложью нарекал (Господне Слово)

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12903'>ضٍ ي</tajweed>َلْعَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allażīna hum fī khauḍiy yal'abūn(a).
verses.translation: Для тех, кто тешился в ничтожных мелочах

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَ دَعًّا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma yuda''ūna ilā nāri jahannama da''ā(n).
verses.translation: В тот День (Одним толчком) неодолимым Они повергнуты во пламя Ада будут

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذِهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12904'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12905'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّتِى كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':11033'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِهَا تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Hāżihin-nārul-latī kuntum bihā tukażżibūn(a).
verses.translation: И скажут им: "Вот тот Огонь, Который вы упрямо отвергали

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَمْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ لَا تُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8674'>بْ</tajweed>صِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Afasiḥrun hāżā am antum lā tubṣirūn(a).
verses.translation: Ужель все это (лишь) дурман Иль не (способны) видеть вы

verses.text_uthmani: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4855'>ٱ</tajweed>صْبِر<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> سَو<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َمَا تُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4248'>جْ</tajweed>زَوْنَ مَا كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Iṣlauhā faṣbirū au lā taṣbirū, sawā'un 'alaikum, innamā tujzauna mā kuntum ta'malūn(a).
verses.translation: Горите в нем - не все ль равно, Вы вытерпите или нет сей Огнь! Ведь такова награда за поступки ваши

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7256'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12906'>تٍ و</tajweed>َنَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innal-muttaqīna fī jannātiw wa na'īm(in).
verses.translation: А праведникам пребывать в Садах услады

verses.text_uthmani: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِهِينَ بِم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> ءَاتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11780'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fākihīna bimā ātāhum rabbuhum, wa waqāhum rabbuhum 'ażābal-jaḥīm(i).
verses.translation: Вкушая то, что даровал им Бог, Избавив их от наказанья Адом

verses.text_uthmani: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كُلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':300'>ٱ</tajweed>شْرَبُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> هَنِ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>يٓـ</tajweed>ـ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':12907'>ـَٔۢا ب</tajweed>ِمَا كُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Kulū wasyrabū hanī'am bimā kuntum ta'malūn(a).
verses.translation: Извольте есть и пить во здравие и пользу, В награду за (хорошие) дела

verses.text_uthmani: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مُتَّكِــِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12908'>رٍ م</tajweed>َّصْفُوفَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12909'>ةٍ‌ۖ و</tajweed>َزَوَّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12381'>جْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':12382'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِحُورٍ ع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Muttaki'īna 'alā sururim maṣfūfah(tin), wa zawwajnāhum biḥūrin 'īn(in).
verses.translation: Там они будут возлежать на ложах, что стоят рядами. И там Мы им в напарницы дадим (Дев) целомудренных с лучистыми (очами)

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12910'>ٱ</tajweed>تَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':12911'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِإِيمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نٍ أَلْحَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12912'>قْ</tajweed>نَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَلَتْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':12913'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنْ عَمَلِه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':12914'>ِم م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2103'>ن ش</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12915'>َىْءٍ‌ۚ ك</tajweed>ُلُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12916'>ٱ</tajweed>مْرِى<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':12917'>ِٕۭ ب</tajweed>ِمَا كَسَبَ رَه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wal-lażīna āmanū wattaba'athum żurriyyatuhum bi'īmānin alḥaqnā bihim żurriyyatahum wa mā alatnāhum min 'amalihim min syai'(in), kullumri'im bimā kasaba rahīn(un).
verses.translation: И те, кто (в Господа) уверовал И чьи потомства веру прадедов избрали, Приведены в едины семьи будут. И не убавим ни на йоту Мы Награды за деянья ваши, - Всяк человек - заложник своих дел

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَمْدَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12918'>دْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':12919'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِفَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِهَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12920'>ةٍ و</tajweed>َلَحْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12921'>مٍ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا يَشْتَه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa amdadnāhum bifākihatiw wa laḥmim mimmā yasytahūn(a).
verses.translation: Мы одарим их из плодов и мяса тем, К чему лежат их устремленья

verses.text_uthmani: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَتَنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>زَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12922'>سًا ل</tajweed>َّا لَغْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12923'>وٌ ف</tajweed>ِيهَا وَلَا تَأْث<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yatanāza'ūna fīhā ka'sal lā lagwun fīhā wa lā ta'ṡīm(un).
verses.translation: Там чашами (любви) обмениваться будут Без пустословья лишнего и всяких побуждений ко греху

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَا<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12924'>نٌ ل</tajweed>َّهُمْ كَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ لُؤْلُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12925'>ؤٌ م</tajweed>َّكْن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa yaṭūfu 'alaihim gilmānul lahum ka'annahum lu'lu'um maknūn(un).
verses.translation: Со всех сторон благоприятствовать им будут Прекрасны юноши, что чистотой своей Подобны бережно хранимым жемчугам

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11343'>قْ</tajweed>بَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11344'>ضٍ ي</tajweed>َتَس<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa aqbala ba'ḍuhum 'alā ba'ḍiy yatasā'alūn(a).
verses.translation: Они приблизятся с расспросами друг к другу

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قَال<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ُوٓ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ ف<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā musyfiqīn(a).
verses.translation: И молвят: "В себе несли мы прежде страх Об участи своих родных и близких

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3045'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَا عَذَابَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12926'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa mannallāhu 'alainā wa waqānā 'ażābas-samūm(i).
verses.translation: Но наш Господь был добр к нам, Избавив нас от наказания самумом

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':128'>ن ق</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':129'>بْ</tajweed>لُ نَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12927'>دْ</tajweed>عُوهُ‌ۖ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12928'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَرُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12929'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>رَّح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā kunnā min qablu nad'ūh(u), innahū huwal-barrur-raḥīm(u).
verses.translation: Взывали мы к Нему и раньше, (А здесь душой уверилися в том), Что Он, поистине, всемилостив и благ

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَذَكِّرْ فَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':169'>نت</tajweed>َ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12930'>نٍ و</tajweed>َلَا مَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11350'>جْ</tajweed>ن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa żakkir famā anta bini'mati rabbika  bikāhiniw wa lā majnūn(in).
verses.translation: А потому Аллаху вознеси хвалу, - Ведь лишь по милости Его Неодержим и не провидец ты

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12931'>رٌ ن</tajweed>َّتَرَبَّصُ بِه<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ِۦ</tajweed> رَيْبَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12932'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am yaqūlūna syā'irin natarabbaṣu bihī raibal-manūn(i).
verses.translation: Иль возгласят они: "Поэт! Мы подождем, пока ход времени Обрушит на него свой (приговор) недобрый

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ِى مَعَك<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':2068'>ُم م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12933'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُتَرَبِّص<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Qul tarabbaṣū fa innī ma'akum minal-mutarabbiṣīn(a).
verses.translation: Скажи (им): "Ждите. А с вами вместе подожду и я

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مُه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':12934'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ‌ۚ</tajweed> أَمْ هُمْ قَوْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12877'>مٌ ط</tajweed>َاغ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am ta'muruhum aḥlāmuhum bihāżā am hum qaumun ṭāgūn(a).
verses.translation: Быть может, неспособность к разуменью Их побуждает ко сему? Иль, может быть, они те люди, Которые дозволенного грани перешли

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed>‌ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am yaqūlūna taqawwalah(ū), bal lā yu'minūn(a).
verses.translation: Иль говорят они: "Он это (Откровение) измыслил". Поистине, не веруют они

verses.text_uthmani: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلْيَأْتُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> بِحَدِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12935'>ثٍ م</tajweed>ِّثْلِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5674'>ن ك</tajweed>َانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falya'tū biḥadīṡim  miṡlihī in kānū ṣādiqīn(a).
verses.translation: А если правду говорят они, Так пусть составят свой рассказ. Подобный этому (Писанью)

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ خُلِقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12936'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am khuliqū min gairi syai'in am humul-khāliqūn(a).
verses.translation: Из ничего сотворены ль они, Иль сами сотворили все

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ خَلَقُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12937'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1474'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ‌ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am khalaqus-samāwāti wal-arḍ(a), bal lā yūqinūn(a).
verses.translation: Иль небеса и землю сотворили сами? Поистине, в них твердой веры нет

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':5060'>ند</tajweed>َهُمْ خَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12938'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُصَۣيْطِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am 'indahum khazā'inu rabbika  am humul-musaiṭirūn(a).
verses.translation: Иль в их руках сокровища (познания) Аллаха? Иль они сами правят (ход событий на земле)

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12939'>مٌ ي</tajweed>َسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ‌ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُه<tajweed class='ikhf_shfw' data-type='ikhafa-shafawi' data-description='Ikhafa' Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':12940'>ُم ب</tajweed>ِسُلْطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7067'>نٍ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am lahum sullamuy yastami'ūna fīh(i), falya'ti mustami'uhum bisulṭānim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: Быть может, лестница имеется у них, Поднявшись по которой Они подслушать могут (все секреты неба)? Тогда пускай один из них Предъявит ясное свидетельство сему

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ لَهُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12941'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تُ وَلَكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12942'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبَن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am lahul-banātu wa lakumul-banūn(a).
verses.translation: Иль только дочери у Бога, У вас же - сыновья

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ تَسْــَٔلُهُمْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':2795'>جْ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12943'>رًا ف</tajweed>َه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':12944'>ُم م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12945'>ِن م</tajweed>َّغْرَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12946'>مٍ م</tajweed>ُّثْقَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am tas'aluhum ajran fahum mim magramim muṡqalūn(a).
verses.translation: Иль ты, (о Мухаммад!), награды ждешь (от них), Они ж - отягчены долгами

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ عِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':3212'>ند</tajweed>َهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12947'>ٱ</tajweed>لْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am 'indahumul-gaibu fahum yaktubūn(a).
verses.translation: Иль в их руках Незримое, О коем они записи ведут

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12948'>دًا‌ۖ ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2514'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> هُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12949'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَكِيد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am yurīdūna kaidā(n), fal-lażīna kafarū humul-makīdūn(a).
verses.translation: Или они тебе, (о Мухаммад!), ловушки ставят? Но те, кто Господа отверг, Сам попадет в такую же (ловушку)

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هٌ غَيْرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4057'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ‌ۚ سُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7648'>بْ</tajweed>حَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>نَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9282'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ عَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا يُشْرِك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Am lahum ilāhun gairullāh(i), subḥānallāhi 'ammā yusyrikūn(a).
verses.translation: Или у них другое божество, кроме Аллаха - Хвала Аллаху от всего, Что в сотоварищи Ему Они (так дерзко) прочат

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':3990'>ِن ي</tajweed>َرَوْ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> كِسْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12950'>فًا م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':64'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءِ سَاقِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12951'>طًا ي</tajweed>َقُولُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> سَحَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12952'>بٌ م</tajweed>َّرْك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مٌ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa iy yarau kisfam minas-samā'i sāqiṭay yaqūlū saḥābum markūm(un).
verses.translation: И если бы кусочек неба обрушился на их глазах, То и тогда б они сказали: "Все это - лишь скопленье облаков

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَوْمَهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12321'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fażarhum ḥattā yulāqū yaumahumul-lażī fīhi yuṣ'aqūn(a).
verses.translation: А потому оставь их (до того мгновенья), Пока они свой День не встретят, Когда они от страха онемеют

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':232'>ـًٔا و</tajweed>َلَا هُمْ يُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':237'>نص</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Yauma lā yugnī 'anhum kaiduhum syai'aw wa lā hum yunṣarūn(a).
verses.translation: Тот День, Когда их хитрости им не помогут И никакой защиты им не ждать

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَذَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':12953'>بًا د</tajweed>ُونَ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ وَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa inna lil-lażīna ẓalamū 'ażāban dūna żālika wa lākinna akṡarahum lā ya'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Поистине, для тех, кто зло творит, Есть кара и помимо этой, Но большинство из них не понимает

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>صْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا‌ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Waṣbir liḥukmi rabbika fa innaka bi'a'yuninā wa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika ḥīna taqūm(u).
verses.translation: А потому ты терпеливо жди указа своего Владыки, - Ведь ты всегда в Деснице Нашей. И на заре, и в бдении (дневном)

verses.text_uthmani: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7856'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':12954'>دْ</tajweed>بَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':12955'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa minal-laili fa sabbiḥhu wa idbāran-nujūm(i).
verses.translation: И ночью возноси Ему хвалу, И в час ухода (на покой) всех звезд
